action.action-desc: Mr. Grothman introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and Labor

form.official-title: To amend the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to extend protection to additional employees.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Age Discrimination in Employment Parity Act of 2022.
Section 11(b) of the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 (29 U.S.C. 630(b)) is amended by striking twenty the 1st place it appears and inserting 15.
This Act and the amendment made by this Act shall take effect 90 days after the date of the enactment of this Act.
